desc:
_Dark cloth of black and purple, stitched with silver and golden threads, this resembles a garment of elvish make. Smoke sometimes billows under the hood._  
**Silent Motion.** A billowing empty cloak glides through the air, either under its own power or on the shoulders of its master. Its movement appears odd somehow, as though it moves slightly out of step with the frame bearing it.  
**Guards.** Created by the shadow fey as unobtrusive guardians, empty cloaks are often paired with animated armor such as a monolith footman, and made to look like a display piece.  
**Shadow Servants.** Shadow fey nobles sometimes wear an empty cloak as their own clothing; they use it to cover a hasty retreat or to assist in a kidnapping.  
**Constructed Nature.** An empty cloak doesnâ€™t require air, food, drink, or sleep.
name: Empty Cloak
condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
languages: understands Elvish and Umbral but can't speak

actions.name: Razor Cloak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shadow Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Shadow Snare
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: Large or smaller creatures are restrained. To escape, the restrained creature or an adjacent ally must use an action to make a successful DC 14 Strength check. The shadow snare has 15 hit points and AC 12.

special_abilities.name: Diligent Sentinel
special_abilities.desc: Empty cloaks are designed to watch for intruders. They gain advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks.

special_abilities.name: Shadow Construction
special_abilities.desc: Empty cloaks are designed with a delicate shadow construction. They burst into pieces, then dissipate into shadow, on a critical hit.

special_abilities.name: Wrapping Embrace
special_abilities.desc: Empty cloaks can share the same space as one Medium or smaller creature. The empty cloak has advantage on attack rolls against any creature in the same space with it.
